content: What's going on with libtest? I merged a change to the external libtest crate, but that isn't used anymore at Top of Tree?
@Ben Brittain it was reverted before the release later this week because the change still needed some ironing
The revert included all updates made to the standalone repo, but I think your PR was merged after the revert
I think the best would be to apply the change to rust-Lang/rust again, I can send a PR that does that
Just wonder if there's anything i can do to help. It would be really really nice to have bench available on stable...
@gnzlbg Thanks for the info :)
No real rush, there are _many_ places to update before I can land the rustc change that removes the unix family definition
There are a couple of actionable items, like making rust-lang/rust use compiletest from crates.io
